articles.title: Ireland fans loved Peter O'Mahony angrily labelling Tomas Lavanini a 'scumbag' during Argentina rout
articles.description: DESPITE the seven tries Ireland put past Argentina at the weekend, the moment that really stuck with fans was Peter O'Mahony standing up for Cian Heal
articles.content:

articles.title: Rare cotton ball-like clouds spotted over Argentina: What are mammatus clouds?
articles.description: A video of mammatus clouds forming over a Argentina recently is doing the rounds on social media. The spectacular moments of the rare mammatus clouds were captured in Casa Grande, Córdoba. The clouds are shaped like cotton balls making it look surreal.
articles.content:

articles.title: Diego Maradona Accused of Raping Girl, 16, in 2000
articles.description: Mavys Alvarez had previously accused Maradona of being involved in trafficking her from Cuba to Argentina.
articles.content:
Mavys Alvarez, a 37-year-old woman from Cuba, said Diego Maradona raped her in 2000.
Alvarez had previously accused Maradona of playing a role in trafficking her from Cuba to Argentina.
Alvarez alleged that she was raped at a Havana drug rehab center... [3434 chars]

articles.title: Cuban woman, who had an affair with Diego Maradona, accuses late footballer of raping her when she was 16
articles.description: Diego Maradona is widely considered to be one of the greatest footballers in history and inspired Argentina to the 1986 World Cup He died last year after undergoing brain surgery on a blood clot and after decades of battles with cocaine and alcohol addictions
articles.content: Havana (Cuba) | AFP: A 37-year-old Cuban woman, who had an affair with Diego Maradona as a minor 20 years ago, accused the late Argentine idol and his entourage on Monday of violence and abuse, including rape and holding her against her will. Mavys A... [2493 chars]

articles.title: Cuban woman says Maradona raped her as teenager, ‘stole my childhood’
articles.description: The complaint relates to a journey Alvarez took to Argentina with Maradona in 2001, when he was around 40 and she was 16.
articles.content: Mavys Alvarez shows photographs of her with Diego Maradona in Havana, Cuba, at the end a press conference in Buenos Aires, Argentina, Monday, Nov. 22, 2021. Alvarez, who as a teenager had a sentimental relationship with Diego Maradona in Cuba during ... [2645 chars]

articles.title: Bubble life has been a 'struggle' says Pumas coach
articles.description: Argentina coach Mario Ledesma lamented two years of "bubble" life but insisted that was not an excuse for the Pumas' poor results this year, which culminated in a 53-7 whipping by Ireland on Sunday.
articles.content:
